Another book I reviewed is available

Posted on 2015-05-11

This winter, I reviewed an introductory book on KnockouJS.

I didn’t learn as much as I did with the PowerShell book last time, but it was a good experience nonetheless. Goes from zero to small application in KnockouJS in a shot period of time.
